title: Tracking Issue `--extern` crate modifiers

labels.name: C-tracking-issue
labels.description: Category: A tracking issue for an RFC or an unstable feature.

body:
This is a tracking issue for command line option syntax currently used by several modifiers affecting behavior of extern crates.
Specific tracking issues for those modifiers:
- https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/98399
- https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/98398
- https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/98400
- https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/111302

The currently used syntax is
```
--extern [MODIFIERS:]NAME[=PATH]
```

Before stabilization it should likely be harmonized with command line syntax already used for native library modifiers, see item (3) in https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/93901#issuecomment-1041325522.
- Modifiers can be converted to `+/-` form
  - `priv` - `+priv` or `-pub`
  - `noprelude` - `-prelude`
  - `nounused` - `+used`
- Position of the `MODIFIERS` component in the option can also be changed.
